imdb.plot outline: With a world full of phenomena, it is Plasma Channel's mission to use these moments for teaching and inspiration. Plasma Channel is a leading media source for energy sciences, with an emphasis on High Voltage and High energy physics. Science is presented through entertaining builds, DIY's, experiments, and conceptual education.
imdb.title: Plasma Channel
plot: With a world full of phenomena, it is _Plasma Channel_ (qv)'s mission to use these moments for teaching and inspiration. _Plasma Channel_ (qv) is a leading media source for energy sciences, with an emphasis on High Voltage and High energy physics. Science is presented through entertaining builds, DIY's, experiments, and conceptual education.
